name: Three drops of blood
description:
This audiovisual creation sets a dramatic scene and develops choreographies for a ritual of substance. 

It is the first one minted under timemachine.tez, a collaborative project between randomminimal and JannoBergmann.

Based on the mathematical principle of the Fourier series, extended to spherical coordinates.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourier_series


Notes:

- The work reacts to keyboard input only after a click into the canvas.
- Sound on! Click once into the canvas to start the sound.
- Best viewed and controlled in HEN fullscreen mode.



+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Controls                                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------+


  Toggle room                                  [mouse click]

  Toggle drown in blood                         [return key]
